import React, { useState, } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { WKT } from 'ol/format'; const FeatureModal = ({ onSave, onCancel }) => { const feature = useSelector((state) =>state.newFeature.newFeature); const [name, setName] = useState(feature.get('name')); const wktFormat = new WKT(); const log = wktFormat.readFeature(feature, { dataProjection: 'EPSG:3857', featureProjection: 'EPSG:3857', }); return (

Edit Feature

setName(e.target.value)} className="mt-1 px-3 py-2 block w-full shadow-sm border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 sm:text-sm" />

Log: {log}

); }; export default FeatureModal;
